about.name: About
about.heading: About Me
about.description: I’m John Paul, a Computer Science student passionate about software development and problem-solving. I’m currently building my skills in full-stack web development, focusing on creating responsive and user-friendly web applications. My goal is to grow as a Software Developer, applying my knowledge to real-world projects while continuously learning new technologies. I’m excited to connect with like-minded professionals and explore opportunities in the tech industry.
